definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Тревога остановлена!</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:AlarmSoundIsPlayed</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">AlarmStop</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
